wxl 1"749 - 2012 ud¾;= 09 jeks isl=rdod - 2012'03'09

II fldgi – wêlrK
msgqj
mk;a ... ... ... ... —
mk;a flgqïm;a ... ... ... ... —
fY%aIaGdêlrKfha ±kaùï ... ... ... ... —
Y%S ,xld weme,a Widúfha ±kaùï ... ... ... —
fY%aIaGdêlrKfha wmrdO kvq ieis ms<sn| ksfõok ... —
Èid wêlrK yd ufyia;%d;a wêlrK ±kaùï ... 236
^fjk fjku f.dkq lr .; yels mßÈ iEu fldgilg u wh;a tla tla  NdIdjlg fjk fjk msgq wxl fhdod we;'&
i;sm;d ksl=;a jk .eiÜ m;%fhys m<lsÍu  i|yd Ndr.kq ,nk ±kaùï ms<sn|
jeo.;a ksfõokhhs
Y%S ,xld m%cd;dka;%sl iudcjd§ ckrcfha .eiÜ m;%fha wjika msgqfõ iEu udihl u uq,a i;sfha § m< lrk ksfõok Ndr.kakd
Èkhka iy fõ,djka ms<sn|j ñka wjOdkh fhduq lrkq ,efí'
.eiÜ m;%fha m< lsÍu i|yd ish¨ u oekaùï Ndr.ekSu .eiÜ m;%h m<lrkq ,nk Èkhg i;s follg fmr isl=rdod
Èkfhys oyj,a 12'00 g wjika lrkq ,efí' ;k;=re - wenE¾;=" úNd." fgkav¾ iy fjkafoais ms<sn| oekaùïj, wjika Èk iy
fõ,djka ta ms<sn|j Wkkaÿjla olajk whg m%udKj;a ld, fõ,djla ,efnk mßÈ fhdod.; hq;= njg" ish¨ u fomd¾;fïka;=" ixia:d
iy uKav, hkdÈh j.n,d.; hq;= nj ñka wjOdrKh flf¾' m<lsÍu i|yd tjkq ,nk iEu oekaùula u ;ks me;af;a muKla
meyeÈ,sj msgm;a l< hq;= h' ksrjoH;djh ms<sn|j lrk úuiSï iy meñKs,s 
.eiÜ m;%h m< jQ Èk isg f;uilg miqj Ndr.kq
fkd,efí'
.eiÜ m;%fha m< lrk iEu oekaùula u .eiÜ m;%h m< lrkq ,nk Èkg i;s follg fmr tkï" 2012 ud¾;= ui 16 jeks
Èk m< flfrk .eiÜ m;%fha oekaùï 2012 ud¾;= ui 02 jeks Èk oyj,a 12'00g fyda Bg fmr ;emEf,ka fyda f.kú;a rcfha

2012 ckjdß ui 01 jeks Èk"
fld<U 08"

235 - B 80340—2,200 (2012/03)
D 1 -

Y%S ,xld m%cd;dka;%sl iudcjd§ ckrcfha .eiÜ m;%h
ie' hq'- 2012'03'02 Èk m< jQ  wxl 1748 ork .eiÜ m;%fha IV ^w& fldgi m< fkdùh'
ie' hq' - pkaÈu ùrlafldä moku ^ixia:d.; lsÍfï& mk;a flgqïm;" 2012 ckjdß ui 06 jeks Èk Y%S ,xld m%cd;dka;s%l iudcjd§ ckrcfha  .eiÜ
m;%fha  II jeks fldgfia w;sf¾lhla jYfhka  m< lrk ,§'
fihahsoa fIaya fldahd ;x.,a ujq,dkd moku ^ixia:d.; lsÍfï& mk;a flgqïm;"  2012 ckjdß ui 20 jeks Èk Y%S ,xld m%cd;dka;s%l iudcjd§
ckrcfha  .eiÜ m;%fha  II  jeks fldgfia  w;sf¾lhla jYfhka  m< lrk ,§'
Y%S ,xld lDIsl¾u wdh;kh ^ixia:d.; lsÍfï& mk;a flgqïm;" 2012 ckjdß ui 20 jeks Èk Y%S ,xld m%cd;dka;s%l iudcjd§ ckrcfh a
.eiÜ m;%fha  II  jeks fldgfia  w;sf¾lhla jYfhka  m< lrk ,§'

II fldgi - Y%S ,xld m%cd;dka;%sl iudcjd§ ckrcfha .eiÜ m;%h  - 2012'03'09236
Èid wêlrK yd ufyia;%d;a wêlrK oekaùï
ufyia;%d;a wêlrKh - .,a.uqj
ld,h bl=;a jQ kvq jd¾;d úkdY lsÍu
.,a.uqj ufyia;%d;a wêlrKfha oekg wjqreÿ mylg ^05& fmr wjika ù we;s kvq lghq;=j, kvq jd¾;d 2012'06'01 jeks Èk fuu wêlrK
N+ñfha § mq¨iaid úkdY lsÍug iQodkï lr we;'
fuu kvqj,g wod< hï md¾Yajlrejl=g ;udg wjYH kvqfõ fyda kvqj, iïmQ¾K iy;sl msgm;la fyda hï fldgil msgm;la
fyda f.dkq lr we;s ,shú,a,la ,nd .ekSug wjYH fõ kï ta i|yd b,a,Sula 2012'05'25 Èkg fuu wêlrKfha frðiag%d¾jrhd fj;
bÈßm;a l< hq;= h'
kshñ; Èkg fmr tjeks b,A,Sula bÈßm;a lsÍug fkdyels jqjfyd;a my; Wmf,aLkfha olajd we;s ish¨ kvq jd¾;d 2012'06'01
Èk fuu wêlrK N+ñfha § mq¨iaid úkdY lrk nj fuhska okajkq ,efí'
úkdY lsÍug kshñ; kvq jd¾;d my; oelafõ'
hQ' î' l=,;=x."
ufyia;%d;a"

II fldgi - Y%S ,xld m%cd;dka;%sl iudcjd§ ckrcfha .eiÜ m;%h  - 2012'03'09 277
ufyia;%d;a wêlrKh - weô,smsáh
wjika jQ kvq jd¾;d úkdY lsÍu
weô,smsáh ufyia;%d;a wêlrKfha wjika ù we;s wjqreÿ 5lg jvd merKs kvq jd¾;d 2012'06'02 jeks Èkg miq fuu wêlrKfha § mq¿iaid
úkdY lsÍug iQodkï lr we;'
02' hï md¾Yjlrefjl= ;udg wjYH kvq jd¾;djl iy;sl msgm;la fyda f.dkq lr we;s ,shú,a,la fyda ,nd .ekSug wjYH
kï ta i|yd b,a¨ïm;la 2012'06'02 jeks Èkg fmr fuu wêlrKh fj; whÿï l< hq;= h'
03' tfia b,a,Sula fkdjk ish¨u kvq jd¾;d 2012'06'02 jeks Èkg miq fuu wêlrK N+ñfha § mq¿iaid úkdY lrk njg fuhska
okajd isáñ'
ufyia;%d;a  - weô,smsáh'
2012 fmnrjdß ui 10 jeks Èk"
weô,smsáh ufyia;%d;a wêlrKfha § h'

kvq wxlh (

weialSis wxlh (
27$12
we;s tia' f,dalkdoka n,h,;a ñkskafodare úiska 1998'02'02 Èk uek
idok ,o wxl 3625 ork msUqf¾ len,s wxl 1 ork ndjÉpdfldgqj
keue;s bvug udhsï" W;=rg ( l=iqï ks,ùrf.a bvfïu fldgila
iy mdr" kef.kysrg ( tia' Ô' iS' fmf¾rd iy ihsuka fmf¾rdg

ìkaÿjhs" rEâ ìkaÿjhs" m¾pia úiskjhl ^w' 0" rE' 0" m¾' 29& úYd,e;s
by; i|yka wxl 3625 ork is;shfï mßÈ thg wh;a ish¨ foaj,a
iu.jk w;r" tlS foam, fld<U bvï ,shdmÈxÑ lsÍfï ld¾hd,fha
î 673$59 ys ,shdmÈxÑ ù we;'
foam, msysá ia:dkh yd m%fõYjk ud¾.h
fld<U 9" fíia,hska mdf¾" Tref.dvj;a; ykaÈfhka yeÍ lvqfj,
olajd Èfjk f,daf,j,a mdf¾ 3 jeks ie;mqï lKqjg jï miska
yuqjk uynq;a.uqj mdf¾ óg¾ 500 bÈßhg .ukalr ;j;a óg¾ 25la
we;=,ska fuu foam, jï miska msysgd we;s w;r" th j¾;udkfha §
wxl 71$1î hkqfjka y÷kajkq ,nk w;r" tu ia:dkhg myiqfjka
m%fõY úh yelsh'
f.ùfï l%uh

II fldgi - Y%S ,xld m%cd;dka;%sl iudcjd§ ckrcfha .eiÜ m;%h  - 2012'03'09284
úúO oekaùï
ujqkaÜ ldfu,a wOHdmksl wdh;kh ixia:d.; lsÍu i|yd jQ mk;ls
cdkl nKavdr jk uu Y%S ,xld m%cd;dka;%sl iudcjd§ ckrcfha md¾,sfïka;=fõ ia:djr ksfhda.j, wxl 48 ork ia:djr ksfhda.h hgf;a

03-346
olaIsK ,xld ;D;Shsl wOHdmk yd kdhl;aj mqyqKq mSGh ixia:d.; lsÍu i|yd jQ mk;ls
